meanings.sent1: The slabbiest cake at the party was the biggest one.
meanings.sent2: She chose the slabbiest piece of pizza because she was very hungry.
meanings.sent3: The slabbiest sandwich I've ever seen was taller than a skyscraper!
meanings.sent4: The slabbiest building in town stood out among the rest with its sheer size.
meanings.sent5: The slabbiest book on the shelf was so thick it could be used as a doorstop.

meanings.sent1: He spread the frosting slabbiest on the cake, making it look messy.
meanings.sent2: The worker laid the bricks slabbiest, causing the wall to be uneven.
meanings.sent3: She danced slabbiest across the stage, tripping over her own feet.
meanings.sent4: The rain fell slabbiest from the sky, creating puddles everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted the canvas slabbiest, resulting in a rough texture.
